text: Kim Hwi-lang (born 3 December 1991) is a South Korean taekwondo practitioner. She won a silver medal in lightweight at the 2013 World Taekwondo Championships, after being defeated by Carmen Marton in the final. She also competed at the 2011 World Taekwondo Championships. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean female taekwondo practitioners Category:World Taekwondo Championships medalists
title: Kim Hwi-lang
